full_text:
Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 751 Filed 08/10/22 Page 142 of 261 1303
LC6VMAX4 McHugh - direct
1 MS. MOE: Thank you, your Honor.
2 DIRECT EXAMINATION
3 BY MS. MOE:
4 Q. Good afternoon, Mr. McHugh.
5 A. Good afternoon.
6 Q. Can you just take a moment to move the microphone so that it's closer to your mouth, that way you don't have to lean forward. Thank you.
7 THE COURT: It's okay to lean forward, too.
8 Q. Thanks very much.
9 All right. Mr. McHugh, can you tell us, where do you work?
10 A. JPMorgan.
11 Q. Is JPMorgan a bank?
12 A. Yes.
13 Q. Can you tell us how long have you worked for JPMorgan?
14 A. Thirty years.
15 Q. What is your current title at JPMorgan?
16 A. Executive -- executive director.
17 Q. What does it mean to be an executive director?
18 A. I'm an officer of the firm.
19 Q. Do you work in a particular department at JPMorgan?
20 A. I work in the client service group.
21 Q. What are your duties and responsibilities as an executive director in the client services group at JPMorgan?
22 SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300
DOJ-OGR-00018479

additional_notes: The document appears to be a court transcript with a clear and legible format. There are no visible redactions or damage.
